page.title: 16LIFE STYLES IN OXSHOTT
page.content: {Mrs X}is a woman in her late 50s who lives in a lovely{detached mock Tudor {house}with a big oak door. She spends much of her time away from home visiting her mother who is ill in hospital, so she is not involved in many social activities. She plays the piano and cello and plays chamber music sometimes. She is married with 2 children, both grown up and living away from home. Her husband is retired. Their house is well furnished with traditional styled furniture. She thinks the local transport services are not very good, but she uses her own car for travelling. {Mrs A}lives in a{council house}made of red brick. She lives with her husband and 2 dogs. Although they are retired they run a local football club which has games winter and summer. She also thinks that public transport is poor.
